languages.text: {n}Голова {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитора{/g} увенчана массивной короной из золотых нейроаугментов, безжалостно изломанной ударами приклада. Бледное тело покрыто богохульными надписями, вырезанными на усохшей плоти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Голова {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитора{/g} увенчана массивной короной из золотых нейро-аугментов, безжалостно изломанной ударами приклада. Бледное тело покрыто богохульными надписями, вырезанными на усохшей плоти.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

{n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine schwere Krone aus goldenen neuralen Augementationen ruht auf dem Kopf des {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g}. Die Krone ist verbeult und zerbrochen, das Ergebnis gnadenloser Schläge mit dem Kolben eines Gewehrs. In das blasse, verkümmerte Fleisch der Leiche wurden blasphemische Inschriften geritzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine schwere Krone aus goldenen neuralen Augementationen ruht auf dem Kopf des {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitors{/g}. Die Krone ist verbeult und zerbrochen, das Ergebnis gnadenloser Schläge mit dem Kolben eines Gewehrs. In das blasse, verkümmerte Fleisch der Leiche wurden blasphemische Inschriften geritzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une lourde couronne d'augmétiques neuraux dorés est posée sur la tête du {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, tordue et brisée par de violents coups de crosse. Le corps blafard est couvert d'inscriptions blasphématoires, taillées dans les chairs flétries.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lourde couronne d'augmétiques neuraux dorés est posée sur la tête du {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, tordue et brisée par de violents coups de crosse. Le corps blafard est couvert d'inscriptions blasphématoires, taillées dans les chairs flétries.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}头上戴着一顶沉重的冠冕，上面满是金制神经植入物。然而，这顶冠冕已经被枪托无情地打坏了。机仆苍白的肉体上也被刻满了亵渎的铭文，这些铭文甚至已经刻进了它干瘪的肌肉层中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}头上戴着一顶沉重的冠冕，上面满是金制神经植入物。然而，这顶冠冕已经被枪托无情地打坏了。奴工苍白的肉体上也被刻满了亵渎的铭文，这些铭文甚至已经刻进了它干瘪的肌肉层中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}黄金の神経オーグメティックのずっしりと重い王冠が、{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}の頭に載っている。銃床で激しく打ち付けられ、王冠は歪んで傷ついてしまっている。その青白い体のしなびた肉に、所狭しと冒涜的な文字が刻まれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黄金の神経オーグメティックのズッシリとした王冠が、{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}の頭にのっている。銃床で激しく打たれて、王冠は歪んで傷ついてしまっている。その青白い体のしなびた肉に、所狭しと冒涜的な文字が刻まれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobre la cabeza del {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g} descansa una pesada corona de auméticos neurales dorados. La corona está doblada y rota por los brutales culatazos que ha recibido. El pálido cuerpo está cubierto de inscripciones blasfemas talladas en la carne marchita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobre la cabeza del {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g} descansa una pesada corona de auméticos neurales dorados. La corona está doblada y rota por los brutales culatazos que ha recibido. El pálido cuerpo está cubierto de inscripciones blasfemas talladas en la carne marchita.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Hizmetörün{/g} başında, altın sinirsel ogmetiklerle donatılmış ağır bir taç duruyor. Taç, acımasız silah kabzası darbeleriyle yer yer eğrilmiş ve de kırılmış. Hizmetörün kurumuş derisine ise kâfirce yazılar kazınmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy crown of golden neural augmetics rests upon the {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}'s head. The crown is bent and broken from ruthless gun-butt blows. The pale body is covered in blasphemous inscriptions carved into the withered flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitör{/g}ün başındaki ağır taç, altın sinirsel ogmetiklerle donatılmış. Taç, sert silah darbeleriyle eğrilmiş ve hatta kısmen kırılmış. Soluk derisineyse kâfirce yazıtlar kazınmış.{/n}
